hero.title: The Modern Standard for
hero.subtitle: A unified Git-native toolkit for linting, code generation, and dependency management. Fully Open Source.

features.title: Two modes.
features.subtitle: EasyP combines a developer-friendly CLI with a powerful remote execution engine.

cli.title: Supercharge your workflow
cli.description: All tools in a single binary. Linting, formatting, and breaking change detection work instantly.

packageManager.title: Package Manager
packageManager.desc: Version management via easyp.lock. Like npm, but for Protobuf.

server.title: Your infrastructure, your rules
server.description: Forget "works on my machine" problems. Centralized generation server guarantees identical results for the entire team.

dockerNative.title: Docker Native
dockerNative.desc: Run any plugins (Java, Python, Node) in containers

costEffective.title: Cost Effective
costEffective.desc: Pay for infrastructure, not per user

architecture.title: Why EasyP is the smarter choice
architecture.subtitle: A fundamental shift in how you manage Protobuf infrastructure.

dataSovereignty.title: Data Sovereignty
dataSovereignty.description: Unlike SaaS solutions where schemas live in the cloud, EasyP is Git-Native. Your data never leaves your secure repositories.

hybridRuntime.title: Hybrid Runtime
hybridRuntime.description: Don't choose between speed and compatibility. EasyP uses Wasm for speed and Docker for heavy plugins.

noVendorLock.title: No Vendor Lock-in
noVendorLock.description: The entire platform is Open Source (Apache 2.0). Host the server yourself, anywhere. No per-user pricing tax.

footer.description: The open-source standard for Protobuf workflows. Built for modern engineering teams.
